name: Arjun Mehta
bias: Neutral - no significant bias towards government or opposition
insights: Tends to reward clear argumentation over rhetoric. Values substance and logical flow. Less influenced by delivery style. Particularly knowledgeable in technology and social policy debates.

name: Kavya Nair
bias: Slight preference for opening government due to case setting.
insights: Gives high scores for clear structure and charismatic delivery. Values emotional appeal and strong stage presence.

name: Rajesh Kumar
bias: Slight preference for closing speakers who synthesize the debate well.
insights: Focuses on the bigger picture and how each team member's speech contributes to the overall strategy. Values high-impact rebuttals.

name: Anitha Rao
bias: Neutral - focuses on the overall merit of arguments.
insights: Evaluates all aspects of a debate equally, including content, strategy, and delivery. Appreciates novel arguments and strong points of information (POIs).
